alluxio.security.authorization

Class Permission

  • java.lang.Object
    • alluxio.security.authorization.Permission

  • @NotThreadSafe
public final class Permission
extends Object
    The permission for a file or directory.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Permission(Permission p)
      Constructs an instance of Permission cloned from the given permission.
      Permission(String owner, String group, Mode mode)
      Constructs an instance of Permission.
      Permission(String owner, String group, short mode)
      Constructs an instance of Permission.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Applies the default umask for newly created directories to the mode bits.

      Applies the default umask for newly created files to the mode bits.

      Applies umask to the mode bits.

        public Permission(String owner,
                  String group,
                  short mode)
        Constructs an instance of Permission. The permission is represented by short.
        Parameters:
        owner - the owner
        group - the group
        mode - the Mode represented by short value

        public Permission applyFileUMask()

        Returns:
        this Permission after umask applied

      • applyDirectoryUMask

        public Permission applyDirectoryUMask()
        Applies the default umask for newly created directories to the mode bits.

        this Permission after umask applied

        Parameters:
        mode - the Mode to set in short
        Returns:
        the updated Permission

      • setOwnerFromThriftClient

        public Permission setOwnerFromThriftClient()
                                    throws IOException
        Sets the owner based on the thrift transport and updates the group to the primary group of the owner. If authentication is AuthType.NOSASL, this a no-op.
        Returns:
        the Permission for a file or a directory
        Throws:
        IOException - when getting owner or group information fails

      • setOwnerFromLoginModule

        public Permission setOwnerFromLoginModule()
                                   throws IOException
        Sets the owner based on the login module and updates the group to the primary group of the owner. If authentication is AuthType.NOSASL, this a no-op.
        Returns:
        the Permission for a file or a directory
        Throws:
        IOException - when getting owner or group information fails

      • defaults

        public static Permission defaults()
        Creates the default Permission for a file or a directory. Both owner and group are empty and the "full access" mode is used.
        Returns:
        the Permission for a file or a directory
